title: Complements of Non-Minimal Subspaces: Characterization Results
abstract:
Inspired by the work of L. Drewnowski in [Studia Math. 77 (1984) 373--391],
our research reveals new insights and characterizes the notion of spaceability
in the context of complements of subspaces (not necessarily closed) within the
universe of F-spaces in terms of [S]-lineability.
